獂字的基本解释

獂
huán
同“豲”。

獂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huán］［yuán］
［《廣韻》愚袁切，平元，疑。］
［《集韻》胡官切，平桓，匣。］
古代传说中的兽名。
[②]［huán］
［《集韻》胡官切，平桓，匣。］
地名。在今甘肃省陇西县东北。

獂字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獂； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页716第31
【廣韻】【集韻】?愚袁切，音元。【玉篇】豕屬。　又【山海經】乾山有獸，狀如牛而三足，名曰獂。其鳴自詨。【註】郭璞曰：獂，音元。【集韻】本作豲。　又【集韻】胡官切，音桓。本作豲。或作?。詳豕部豲字註。　又【史記·秦本紀】孝公西斬戎之獂王。【註】地理志：天水有豲道縣。

獂字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
獂字的起名意思

暂无。

Roe

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huán］［yuán］
["Guang Yun" Yu Yuan Qi, Ping Yuan, doubt. ]
["Jiyun" Hu Guanqie, Pinghuan, Xie. ]
The name of the animal in ancient legends.
[②] [huán]
["Jiyun" Hu Guanqie, Pinghuan, Xie. ]
Place name. In today's northeast of Longxi County, Gansu Province.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　獂; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 716 31
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Yuan cut, phoneme. 【Jade articles】The genus hog.　 [Shan Hai Jing] Dry mountains have beasts, like cows with three legs, and their name is roe. Its ming is self-sufficient. [Note] Guo Pu said: 獂, phonetic element. [Ji Yun] This is a fascination.　[Jiyun] Hu Guanqie, Yinhuan. This is a penny. Or for?. Detailed hogbuqin word note.　[Historical Records·Qin Benji] Xiao Gong Xi cuts the Rong King to the west. [Note] Geography: There is Bindao County in Tianshui.
Roe
